data.name: Decentralized Bank
data.description:
## What Is Decentralized Bank (DEBA)?

DeBa (short for Decentralized Bank) automatically farms the highest yield available among the best DeFi protocols using the latest farming techniques. DeBa features the largest collection of yield vaults, with even more to be added in the coming weeks and months.

## What are the Tokenomics for DEBA?
* DEBA Token holders receive cashflows from revenues on AUM, currently set to 25% profit sharing
* Circulating supply at launch: 0
* DEBA Token has a total max supply of 21,000,000 that will be minted during a 5 year period
* DeBa was completely bootstrapped, with no VCs, token sale, premine or team rewards

## How Many DEBA Tokens Are There in Circulation?

Decentralized Bank launched its protocol on December 10th , 2020 with 0 DEBA tokens created at genesis. Starting with December 11th, tokens are minted on a daily basis for a period of 5 years. The minting is based on a logarithmic decay function described in docs.deba.finance and our github. Of the minted tokens, 20% go to the treasury, 60% to Yield Vaults and 20% to the LP Vault. At the time of writing, 


### Who Are the Founders of Decentralized Bank?

The founders of DeBa are anonymous.


### Where Can I Buy DeBa (DEBA)?

DEBA is available for trading on a growing number of exchanges, with cryptocurrency pairs currently available.

You can trade DEBA on [Uniswap](https://info.uniswap.org/pair/0x9245c872cb8404e3f89bb5c39410a82303faa566)

New to cryptocurrency? Read CoinMarketCap’s [easy guide](https://coinmarketcap.com/how-to-buy-bitcoin/) to buying Bitcoin or any other token.
